title: New Dream Hunter Rem: Yume no Kishitachi
original_name: NEW DREAM HUNTER 麗夢 夢の騎士達
ending_song: "Yume no Ikidomari (夢の行き止まり)" by Matsui Naoko
sinopse: Rem is an ordinary woman in our world but, in the world of dreams, she becomes a dream warrior, defending humanity from the evils there. When dream demons reach the waking world, she fights them with the help of her pets which transform into a tiger and wolf.
